DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare the effectiveness of a vitamin D3 oral spray solution with capsules at raising vitamin D status over winter. This randomised crossover trial will aim to recruit a total of 22 healthy participants for a total of two 4-week interventions separated by a 10-week washout.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Capsules and Oral Spray Solution as Methods of Delivering Vitamin D3 and Raising Status
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy Over the age of 18 Those that intend to consume a supplement containing vitamin D at any point during the study Those under the age of 18. Individuals that are on prescribed medication that is known to affect vitamin D metabolism Those following a vegan diet Sunbed users Participants that are planning a sun holiday during the study
